text: Edris Saint-Amand (born 26 March 1918) was a Haitian novelist. Born in Gonaïves, one of Saint-Amand's most notable novels is Bon Dieu Rit (1952). ==References== * Category:1918 births Category:2004 deaths Category:20th- century Haitian novelists Category:Haitian male novelists Category:People from Gonaïves Category:20th-century male writers
title: Edris Saint-Amand
